Activity: Arrive at work, log into the computer, check emails and browse some interesting artistic exhibitions online.
Review patient schedule and prepare for morning assessments. Check vaccine inventory and ensure adequate supply.
Begin patient assessments, focusing on patients scheduled for influenza vaccinations. Ensure their eligibility based on medical history and current health status.
Accurately document assessment findings in the EHR. Pay special attention to any allergies or contraindications for the influenza vaccine.
Administer influenza vaccinations and diligently document the vaccination details in the EHR. Double-check all entries for accuracy.
Assist @trainer-1 by providing feedback on the EHR training materials based on my experiences with data entry and navigation.
Lunch Break. Listen to music and relax.
Continue patient assessments and influenza vaccinations. Document all findings and vaccinations meticulously in the EHR.
Contact @his-1 to report a potential discrepancy I noticed in the EHR data fields related to vaccine administration. @PEOPLE [his-1], Topic: EHR Data Field Discrepancy.
Prepare end-of-day report of the work progress and create a to-do list for tomorrow.
Check and respond to the emails.
